name: Dad and G's Trip to Candy Land
name_original: Dad and G's Trip to Candy Land
description:
Thank you for checking out my Brackeys 2021.1 Game Jam Entry. Please comment/review and I will be sure to return a review Dad and G's Trip to Candyland

All they wanted to do was give mom a break and get some candy. On their way to Candyland they were separated and now need to find each other and still get to Candyland.

This game was made with the help of my 5 year old daughter G. We sat down and game up with the ideas together. All the art was approved by her and the monsters were drawn by her. We hope you enjoy playing!
